acceptance-test-run.title: Verify all of the Social Media navigation links open correctly
acceptance-test-run.name: Verify all of the Social Media navigation links open correctly

test-group.name: [1] {socMediaLink=Twitter}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {Twitter} link
Then the {Twitter} page should open correctly
[2] {socMediaLink=Facebook}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {Facebook} link
Then the {Facebook} page should open correctly
[3] {socMediaLink=LinkedIn}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {LinkedIn} link
Then the {LinkedIn} page should open correctly
[4] {socMediaLink=YouTube}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {YouTube} link
Then the ｟YouTube｠ page should open correctly
